abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of about 10,600
            newly serviced plots and improvement to existing squatter
            settlements affecting about 8,800 dwellings and related
            infrastructure and community facilities including community
            education centers, dispensaries and markets; construction
            loans for purchase of building materials; a pilot nutrition
            project; expansion of training facilities at the Ardhi
            Institute and training program for Ardhi technical staff;
            consultants services for design and detailed engineering,
            overall project supervision and preparation of a follow-up
            project; and monitoring and evaluation of the project.
